trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using .NET SDK | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using .NET SDK | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters for Azure HDInsight using .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters for Azure HDInsight using .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using .NET SDK
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).
trans-unit.target: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:

trans-unit.source: An Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: An Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2013 or 2015.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2013 or 2015.

trans-unit.source: Create clusters
trans-unit.target: Create clusters

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight .NET SDK provides .NET client libraries that make it easier to work with HDInsight from a .NET Framework application.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight .NET SDK provides .NET client libraries that make it easier to work with HDInsight from a .NET Framework application.

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to create a Visual Studio console application and paste the code for creating a cluster.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions below to create a Visual Studio console application and paste the code for creating a cluster.

trans-unit.source: The application requires an Azure resource group, and the default storage account.
trans-unit.target: The application requires an Azure resource group, and the default storage account.

trans-unit.source: The [Appendix A](#appx-a-create-dependent-components) provices a PowerShell script to create the dependent components.
trans-unit.target: The [Appendix A](#appx-a-create-dependent-components) provices a PowerShell script to create the dependent components.

trans-unit.source: **To create a Visual Studio console application**
trans-unit.target: **To create a Visual Studio console application**

trans-unit.source: Create a new C# console application in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Create a new C# console application in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Run the following Nuget command in the Nuget Package Management console.
trans-unit.target: Run the following Nuget command in the Nuget Package Management console.

trans-unit.source: From Solution Explorer, double-click **Program.cs** to open it, paste the following code, and provide values for the variables:
trans-unit.target: From Solution Explorer, double-click **Program.cs** to open it, paste the following code, and provide values for the variables:

trans-unit.source: Press **F5** to run the application.
trans-unit.target: Press **F5** to run the application.

trans-unit.source: A console window should open and display the status of the application.
trans-unit.target: A console window should open and display the status of the application.

trans-unit.source: You will also be prompted to enter your Azure account credentials.
trans-unit.target: You will also be prompted to enter your Azure account credentials.

trans-unit.source: It can take several minutes to create an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: It can take several minutes to create an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: In this article, you have learned several ways to create an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you have learned several ways to create an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.target: Appx-A Create dependent components
